scripts.build:analyze: npm run build && npm run analyze
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run type-check
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy updates - Example' && git push origin main
scripts.save: git add -A && git commit -m 'Auto-save changes - Example' && git push origin main
scripts.quick-push: git add -A && git commit -m 'ðŸš€ Quick update - Example' && git push origin main
